# UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.automatic

**Case**

A constant that automatically determines the visibility of the display mode button.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

With this behavior, setting [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISplitViewController/presentsWithGesture] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] hides the display mode button. This behavior is the default.

## Constants

- **UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.never**: A constant that prevents the display mode button from appearing.
- **UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.always**: A constant that allows the display mode button to always appear.
